report.title: Notifications list for notifications centre
report.description: A list of notifications for use with the notifications centre extension, has additional functionality for handling edit and view icons on the grid when compared to the notifications_list.xml report.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM notifications n LEFT JOIN cache_occurrences_functional o ON o.id=n.linked_id AND (n.source='Verifications and comments' OR n.source_type='S') LEFT JOIN cache_occurrences_functional coFilter ON n.linked_id=coFilter.id #joins# WHERE n.acknowledged=false and n.user_id=#user_id# and (o.training=#training# or o.id is null) and n.source_type<>'T' -- skip trigger notifications which don't display correctly in the grid #order_by#

param.name: source_filter
param.lookup_values: all:Anything,verifications:Verifications,rejections_queries:Rejections and queries,record_cleaner:Record Cleaner,record_comments:Record comments,pending_groups_users:Requests to join a group you administer

param.name: source_types
param.description: Comma separated list of source types with each item single quoted, or blank to allow all.

param.name: system_name
param.description: Name to display instead of admin for system generated notifications

param.name: default_edit_page_path
param.description: The default page that the notification edit link goes to if the input_form is blank and the user has rights to perform the edit

param.name: view_record_page_path
param.description: The default page that the notification view link goes to if the user has rights to view the record

param.name: groups_admin_page_path
param.description: The path to the page which allows group admins to manage membership

param.name: website_id
param.display: Website Id for the occurrence record.

param.name: group_ids
param.description: Comma separated list of groups ids, or blank to allow all. Only notifications associated with these group ids will be displayed.

column.name: editing_form
column.sql: case when o.input_form is null AND o.website_id=#website_id# AND o.created_by_id=#user_id# then'#default_edit_page_path#'else o.input_form end

column.name: viewing_form
column.sql: case when o.website_id=#website_id# then '#view_record_page_path#' else null end

column.name: editable_flag
column.sql: case when o.website_id=#website_id# AND o.created_by_id=#user_id# AND ('#default_edit_page_path#' <> 'null' OR o.input_form IS NOT null) then true else false end

column.name: viewable_flag
column.sql: case when o.website_id=#website_id# AND '#view_record_page_path#' <> 'null' then true else false end

column.name: reply_flag
column.sql: case when o.website_id=#website_id# then true else false end

column.name: manage_members_flag
column.sql: case when n.source_type='GU' then true else false end
